name: webchat
description: Interoperable browser chat built on OpenOdin

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist/* ./build && mkdir -p dist && npm run tsc && npm run build-script && npm run build-app
scripts.release: rm -rf ./dist/* ./build && mkdir -p dist && npm run tsc && npm run build-script && npm run build-app-release
scripts.build-app: npx webpack -c ./webpack.config.js && cp -r ./conf-dev/*.json ./src/index.html ./src/favicon.ico ./src/gfx ./node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm.wasm ./node_modules/openodin/build/src/signatureoffloader/signatureOffloader-worker-browser.js ./node_modules/openodin/build/src/storage/crdt/crdt-worker-browser.js ./dist/ && sed -i.bak "s/Interoperable Messaging/Interoperable Messaging ($(git rev-parse --short HEAD))/" dist/main.js
scripts.build-app-release: npx webpack -c ./webpack.config.release.js && cp -r ./src/index.html ./src/favicon.ico ./src/gfx ./node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm.wasm ./node_modules/openodin/build/src/signatureoffloader/signatureOffloader-worker-browser.js ./node_modules/openodin/build/src/storage/crdt/crdt-worker-browser.js ./dist/ && sed -i.bak "s/Interoperable Messaging/Interoperable Messaging ($(git rev-parse --short HEAD))/" dist/main.js

author: OpenOdin
